thread.title: Lewis Hamilton calls for changes in Formula One - Redditch Advertiser
thread.title_full: Lewis Hamilton calls for changes in Formula One - Redditch Advertiser - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Redditch Advertiser
title: Lewis Hamilton calls for changes in Formula One - Redditch Advertiser
text:
Lewis Hamilton has backed Bernie Ecclestone's call for changes to be made to Formula One's regulations in a bid to spice up the sport. In an interview aired on German television earlier this week, Ecclestone was highly critical of the current state of grand prix racing.
 Redditch Advertiser.
